config.Enable this mod.name: Enable this mod.
config.Enable this mod.description: On/Off setting of this mod itself.
config.Theft of the Winter Star ver.name: Theft of the Winter Star ver
config.Theft of the Winter Star ver.desc: The elevator position will be changed so that it is not covered when the Theft of the Winter Star MOD is installed.
config.Stardew Valley Reimagined 3 ver.d: If you are using the Stardew Valley Reimagined 3 MOD to modify the backyard MAP, change the entrance to this BBEA to the back woods west and modify the tunnels, etc. accordingly.
config.Repositioning of entrances.name: Repositioning of entrances
config.Repositioning of entrances.descri: If checked, the entrance to the Extra Area will be changed to the upper right corner. Use this when the entrance/exit is in the lower left corner, for example, when it interferes with other mods.
